result.arabic_text: لَا يَحۡزُنُهُمُ ٱلۡفَزَعُ ٱلۡأَكۡبَرُ وَتَتَلَقَّىٰهُمُ ٱلۡمَلَٰٓئِكَةُ هَٰذَا يَوۡمُكُمُ ٱلَّذِي كُنتُمۡ تُوعَدُونَ
result.translation: Intureka zihambaye z’uwo musi ntizizobatera ubwoba namba, bazokwakirwa n’abamalayika babakeza bati: “Uwu ni wo musi wanyu mwasezeraniwe ko muzohemberwa ivyo mwakoze”;
